nodes.bodyText: This has the potential to break any libraries that don't currently have changelogs. @JimSuplizio Do we know if we have any such libraries any more?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -175,6 +175,13 @@ jobs:
           jdkVersionOption: $(JavaBuildVersion)
           jdkArchitectureOption: 'x64'
           publishJUnitResults: false
+      
+      - ${{ each artifact in parameters.Artifacts }}:
+        - template: /eng/common/pipelines/templates/steps/verify-changelog.yml

nodes.bodyText:
@weshaggard There have been a bunch of new libraries added to the client track and many of those were initially put in without changelogs so I'm not 100% sure yet, but I will be shortly.
@chidozieononiwu if this is going to fail the pipeline then this should happen before the build. Right now, we verify the versions in pom files, then verify the readmes and then build. Your step should be added after the readme verification and before the build.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -175,6 +175,13 @@ jobs:
           jdkVersionOption: $(JavaBuildVersion)
           jdkArchitectureOption: 'x64'
           publishJUnitResults: false
+      
+      - ${{ each artifact in parameters.Artifacts }}:
+        - template: /eng/common/pipelines/templates/steps/verify-changelog.yml

nodes.bodyText:
@JimSuplizio Where do you suggest I put it?
I think what you have in mind is ideal, however we also run things like verify-readmes in analyze which  should ideally happen before build. I think this is still the best place for this right now giving how the pipeline is structured.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -175,6 +175,13 @@ jobs:
           jdkVersionOption: $(JavaBuildVersion)
           jdkArchitectureOption: 'x64'
           publishJUnitResults: false
+      
+      - ${{ each artifact in parameters.Artifacts }}:
+        - template: /eng/common/pipelines/templates/steps/verify-changelog.yml

nodes.bodyText: This should be a step under VerifyReleaseVersion job, where the other verifications are performed, instead of under TagRepository.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -91,6 +91,11 @@ stages:
                 deploy:
                   steps:
                     - checkout: self
+                    - template: /eng/common/pipelines/templates/steps/verify-changelog.yml
